name: Where Is Kitsu
description:
FIND KITSU INSIDE CLASSIC CASUAL ARCADE GAMES

Where is Kitsu is the winner of the 4th None Jam edition, a 7-day Game jam.

This project was made in January 2020 and its composed of 3 mini-games (Flappy Mush, Dino Mush and Mush Invader) in which, Kitsu, a mushroom, is the protagonist of each one of them!

The theme of the Game jam was: Demake.

Credits:

Diogo Frazão- Twitter
